Class Node

java.lang.Object
Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Node>
public class Node extends Object implements Comparable<Node>
Class which defines a Node. A point on a map which has a name and it will be used in the Edge class.
It also represent a point between edges.
Author:
A. La Fauci De Leo Adapted from Mandliya(2020)
